subject: RE: [junit] help please
msgSnippet: ... Well, perhaps the flight took them nearer to their god of choice... ;) Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
> You will hopefully not need direct involvement from ALLAH.
> If Kent Beck and Erich Gamma wrote JUnit on an airplane
> flight, I think you and your four fellow students can imitate
> it in time for graduation, without divine intervention.

Well, perhaps the flight took them nearer to their god of choice... ;)

Cheers, Ilja
